answers.answer: The POTUS today promised to the Pharma Ceo's he will minimize the FDA drug approval time. So may be we can see replicor more earlier. Imo.
The POTUS met today big Pharma Ceo's and promised to minimize the FDA drug approval time so who knows we might see cure in our generation...
I really don't know Stephen but some times it feels like they hold the cure drug on purpose making sure their existence on market.

question: Probably at least another 3 years.Our next update on our results will be posted on our website following the APASL conference in Shanghai in February.
